title: kAlige biddeno
sahitya:
kAlige biddeno kaiya biDO bALu baduku mattaidAgi


caraNam 1    adhara kambisadiro rangayya adhara saviyendu savidEne
    caraNam 2    edeya muTTadiro elo ranga adu marada moggendu piDidEne
    caraNam 3    atte kaNDare racceLikkOLu avaLitta bandare maruLAguvaLe
    caraNam 4    gaNDa gaNDare enna kondAnu ede guNDigeSTu illi baralikke
    caraNam 5    nAdini ennanu sEraLu ati mOdavAgi ibbarALuve
    caraNam 6    manave kombuvarelladeragaLu enna purandara viTTalanendariyeyEne
